name: Jlm resume
body:
Summary
I am a web developer familiar with the fundamentals of MVC and TDD, and constantly pursuing my passion to continuously learn new languages, frameworks and techniques in order to become a better computer programmer. I have always been drawn to tech in all its forms, and over the last 15 years, I've dabbled in many different programming languages and web development/publishing platforms. What really excites me about programming is the near-constant sense of working on an elaborate puzzle, and the great satisfaction that comes when all the pieces fit together and the final picture appears.

Check out my code projects by clicking the link below to my GitHub account.
(The picture was automatically added by LinkedIn by scraping my GitHub profile pic... I'm not actually that vain.)

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
